title: Issues with game client
body: In this newest patch I've been getting a lot of lag. i am lagging in game with low fps when i never used to before even though my ping/ms is at around 20. this has been losing me games for this entire week due to not being able to see where enemies are due to the lag. Ability usage seems to worsen this. Any help will be appreciated.

replies.body: It's important to determine if this is being caused by fps or a network issue like packet loss.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for the impacted games to get an overview, and let me know what you find.  We'll go from there!
